- growing inability to honor debt obligations
- declining $ to buy loyalty  
- collapsing oil infrastructure; and 
- growing inability to access international deposits

And it only gets worse from here

This is child abuse being committed by the United States government.

Everyone should be outraged that this is happening in America and Trump administration officials must be held accountable.
